name: [WIP] Expanded Convoys and Shipping Lanes
description:
WIP: EXPECT BUGS AND UNINTENDED BEHAVIOR 
Adds an extensive list of convoys and merchant vessel shipping lanes. Currently I am only looking for feedback, or potential contributors to this mod. 

 This mod requires the following mods: 
Expanded Ports Mod (shipping lanes an convoys incorporate ports not currently in base game) 
 Saint-Nazaire Port mod (Required by Expanded Ports mod) 
More Diverse Ship names (Due to additional country ports and shipping vessels, additional ship names are provided by this mod) 

Features:
Added Reserve Naval forces in Ports owned by Germany and other ports, which was missing. 
Added Merchant Shipping lanes in North and South America (Complete)
Added Trans Atlantic Shipping lanes (Mostly Complete)
Added German Supply routes (Partially Complete)
 Additional Convoys (incomplete) 
 activity periods for Shipping lanes and Convoys (on hold due to bug)
Fighter Aircraft (partially working)
A large number of additional country shipping vessels have been added, however they are currently missing Flag assets.Someone please Develop a flag mod :-)
author: Link
